roleset.name: dress in costume as a pop culture character

example.name: cosplay-v
example.text: Two women , cosplaying as a pokemon and pokemon trainer , are posing for a picture in the street .
example.arg: as a pokemon and pokemon trainer

example.name: cosplay-n
example.text: One standout cosplayer reinforced the beauty of the male form with his cosplay of the August 11, 2016 issue of Japanese men's fitness magazine Tarzan.
example.arg: of the August 11, 2016 issue of Japanese men's fitness magazine Tarzan.

roleset.note: COSPLAY-V, COSPLAY-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.
